notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: G.G.-L.Y. and C.B.-S.L. conceived and designed the experiments. S.G., J.K.-M.L., G.G.-L.Y., Y.-Y.C. and X.-X.L. conducted experiments. G.G.-L.Y., S.G. and J.K.-M.L. performed data analysis. E.C.-W.W. and T.Z. contributed in chemical analysis. C.B.-S.L. provided resources. G.G.-L.Y. wrote the manuscript that was revised by M.S.J.S., P.-C.S. and finalized by C.B.-S.L. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
